control_sets.title: Authenticating
control_sets.tip:
Start a KalturaSession (ks) by supplying your Partner ID and Admin Secret.

You can find your info in the [Kaltura Management Console](http://kmc.kaltura.com/index.php/kmc/kmc4#account|integration)

control_sets.title: Uploading a Video
control_sets.tip:
Use an ```<input type="file">``` tag to upload a video file. Javascript clients should use the [jQuery fileupload plugin](https://github.com/kaltura/jQuery-File-Upload)

You can use the page below to upload a video or image file. If you don't have a video file handy, you can [download a sample](/charlie-bit-me.mp4)

control_sets.title: Creating a Media Entry
control_sets.tip: Once the file has been uploaded, use the baseEntry service to create a Media Entry from it.
